name: 戚務正
objective: 本課程介紹工程與科學相關之主要地球物理方法及應用，包含震測，重力，熱流，及磁力。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來解決工程問題。
schedule:
week　　Description
1　　Seismic principles - moduli, wave propagation, Snell, reflection, surface waves, porosity, Q, sources, geophones and digital recorders  (Text Ch 1 &2 all)
2　　Refraction - acquisition, sources, t-x plots, depth, dip, reversal 
(Text Ch 3 pp 65-99)
3　　Reflection principles - profiling, sounding, NMO, dip, Vrms, Dix, vert resolution, horiz resolution 
 (Text Ch 4 pp 149-175)
4　　Reflection acquisition - spreads, s/n, stack chart, phases, spatial aliasing 
(Text Ch 4 pp 200-229) (Skip Sec 4.4.3  pp 209-216)
5　　Gravity principles - densities, corrections, instruments, acquisition 
(Text Ch 6 pp 349-388)
6　　Gravity interpretation - modeling, trends, contouring, spatial filters
(Text Ch 6 pp 388-420)
7　　Electrical/hydraulic properties - rocks, fluids 
8　　DC Resistivity - acquisition, apparent resistivity, modeling, curve fitting
(Text Ch 5  pp 310-340)  
9　　Heat Flow – thermal conductivity, conduction vs. advection
10　　GPR 
11　　Group Project Results Presentations
